alert.note: Alert for Central Carbon County; Ferris, Seminoe, Shirley Mountains; Laramie Valley; North Snowy Range Foothills; Shirley Basin; Sierra Madre Range; Snowy Range; Southwest Carbon County; Upper North Platte River Basin (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 2:58PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...Thunderstorms with brief strong gusty winds will impact portions of southeastern Carbon and southwestern Albany Counties through 345 PM MDT... At 257 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a line of thunderstorms extending from 10 miles east of Separation Lake to near Savery. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Albany, Saratoga, Hanna, Encampment, Sinclair, Medicine Bow, Rock River, Elk Mountain, Grand Encampment, Six Mile Campground, Rob Roy Reservoir, Lake Owen, Arlington, Hog Park Reservoir, French Creek Campground, Jack Creek Campground, Bow River Campground, Illinois Creek Campground, Rob Roy Campground and Lincoln Park Campground. This includes Interstate 80 in Wyoming between mile markers 219 and 291. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
